body.name: Lifewit Silverware Drawer Organizer, Expandable Utensil Tray for Kitchen, Adjustable Flatware and Cutlery Holder, Compact Plastic Storage for Spoons Forks Knives, Large, Black
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 14. Order within 8 hrs 36 mins
features: Large Capacity: Organize your kitchen drawer and make more space with the this silverware organizer. Comes with two expandable panels on the left and right to store more silverware, cutlery, and kitchen utensils.

Adjustable Size: With an adjustable width between 13 - 22.4 inches, it is compatible with different drawer sizes. When fully expanded, the cutlery box dimensions are 22.4 x 15 x 2 inches and when fully folded, it reduces to 13 x 15 x 2 inches. So no matter what size your kitchen drawers are, this utensil organizer will surely fit in.

Sort Your Silverware: With 3 different size options and a total of 8 compartments for easy sorting and storage, this kitchen drawer organizer allows you to easily recognize, identify & pick up the items you need for use.

Premium Material: Made of thick and sturdy premium PP material, the cutlery organizer is BPA free so you can rest assured that it is safe to use with all forms of tableware. The durable construction means it is built to last for a long time.
Easy to Use: The flatware organizer is very easy to use with a unique edge design that allows you to move with ease. To clean, simply rinse with water to remove stains. Do not wash in the dishwasher.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Adjustable Size： The cutlery box measures 22.4 x 15 x 2 inches, shrinks to 13 x 15 x 2 inches when fully folded and can be customized to fit your drawer size. With 8 compartments, it is easy to store different sized cutlery.
Buckle Design Easy and smooth adjustment, with safe and reliable buckle. Easy to Carry Edge design allows you move this silverware organizer with ease.
Cleaning Guide: - When accidentally stained, wash it through the faucet, and then dry it with a cloth. - Do not wash in the dishwasher.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Adjusted to a perfect fit in kitchen drawer and accommodated all my silverware + extra necessities! Sturdy material and easy to clean. I went with the dark color because I'm tired of the white & it's aesthetically pleasing. It's taken me awhile to find something I'm totally satisfied with.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Product! Very worth it.
reviews.reviewText: Before I bought this product, I read the reviews on it and got convinced to give this product a try. I can say I don’t regret buying it whatsoever, it’s a great product! It’s very convenient because you can adjust it to fit your drawer or however you prefer. The material does not feel cheap at all and it has a smooth finish on it. I’m satisfied with it. Hope this review helps you!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I like how the sides expand! Its nice and sturdy

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Love the product
reviews.reviewText: Love the expandable feature, not too sturdy in expansion but acceptable when laid flat. Love the size, it fits my tons of silverware!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great value, great storage, great design.
reviews.reviewText: This thing is awesome! Super spacious, holds tons of silverware. Love the ability to extend on the sides. This this hold SO much! I can't recommend it enough. Don't go looking elsewhere, I promise you, you won't be disappointed with this product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is the best silverware organizer. The fact that it’s adjustable means that it will fit perfectly in your drawer with no side gaps unless you want them. The material is great, easy to clean, non toxic BPA free, and has plenty of room. I love it!.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quality and size
reviews.reviewText: You will love this as it has bonus sides for larger items. Well made. Larger than normal. Great value.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is a nice flatware organizer. In the past my regular knives did not fit with the same slots as forks, etc I alway had it put them in the long slot on the end. My knives fit perfectly in this organizer. This is much better than those wood organizer. This is very easy to expand also. Very happy with this.

reviews.reviewTitle: A Versatile and Neat Organizer for Kitchen Drawer
reviews.reviewText: I bought the Lifewit Silverware Organizer to organize my kitchen drawer and I am very happy with it. It has a great capacity to hold things like utensils and cutlery, and it is very versatile. I can adjust the size of the tray to fit my drawer perfectly, and I can use it for a variety of items, not just silverware.It is also BPA free, which is important for me. It makes my drawer look neatly organized and easy to access.The only minor drawback is that the slider is not very tight and it can slide when I accessing tools. However, I solved this problem by putting some transparent tape on the sides to keep it in place. It is not a big deal and it does not affect the functionality of the product.I would recommend this product to anyone who needs a good organizer for their kitchen drawer. It is well-made, durable, and easy to clean. It is a great value for the money.
Material de buena calidad, se adapto perfecto a mi cajón
Encaja súper bien en el cajón y puedes ampliarlo o reducirlo

Pro:Design espandibile e regolabileAmpio spazio per posate e utensiliMateriale resistente e facile da pulireBuon rapporto qualità-prezzoContro:Le istruzioni di montaggio potrebbero essere più chiareNon adatto a cassetti molto piccoliRecensione:Il Lifewit Portaposate da Cassetto è un prodotto versatile e funzionale che permette di organizzare al meglio le posate e gli utensili in cucina. Il design espandibile e regolabile lo rende adatto a cassetti di diverse dimensioni, mentre l'ampio spazio interno consente di riporre comodamente tutti gli utensili necessari.Il materiale resistente e facile da pulire rende il portaposate Lifewit un prodotto duraturo e pratico. Inoltre, il suo prezzo competitivo lo rende un'ottima scelta per chi desidera un prodotto di qualità senza spendere troppo.Tuttavia, ci sono alcuni aspetti da tenere a mente:Le istruzioni di montaggio potrebbero essere più chiare e dettagliate.Il portaposate potrebbe non essere adatto a cassetti molto piccoli.In generale, il Lifewit Portaposate da Cassetto è un prodotto consigliato a chi desidera organizzare al meglio le posate e gli utensili in cucina. Il suo design versatile, la sua funzionalità e il suo prezzo competitivo lo rendono un'ottima scelta per la maggior parte delle persone.Suggerimenti per gli acquirenti:Misurate il vostro cassetto prima di acquistare il portaposate per assicurarvi che sia compatibile.Se avete difficoltà con il montaggio, consultate il manuale di istruzioni o cercate tutorial online.Se avete un cassetto molto piccolo, potreste dover considerare un modello di portaposate diverso.Oltre a quanto sopra, ecco alcuni altri aspetti da considerare:Materiali: Il portaposate Lifewit è realizzato in plastica resistente. Se preferite un materiale diverso, come il bambù o il metallo, esistono altri modelli sul mercato.Scomparti: Il portaposate Lifewit ha diversi scomparti per riporre posate e utensili di diverse dimensioni. Se avete bisogno di più scomparti per un certo tipo di utensile, come i coltelli, potreste dover considerare un modello diverso.Spero che questa recensione ti sia stata utile.
Color muy bonito y muy práctico, porque al ser extensible se adapta al cajón aprovechando el espacio. Se desarma facilmente y se puede lavar en el lavavajillas
